trans-unit.source: "It wandered slowly across the landscape, calling out in its lonely voice, but no other castles answered its cries."\n—*Beyond the Great Henge*
trans-unit.target: 「它缓缓越过大地，孤独地呼唤，但其他的城堡从未应声。」 ～*《圆石阵奇谭》*

trans-unit.source: Scalding Cauldron
trans-unit.target: 沸腾鼎镬

trans-unit.source: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Scalding Cauldron: It deals 3 damage to target creature.
trans-unit.target: {3}，{T}，牺牲沸腾鼎镬：它对目标生物造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "It's a witch's trick, this cauldron full of pain. I wouldn't dump it on any but the wicked."
trans-unit.target: 「这满满一鼎的痛苦都是女巫的杰作。我只会往邪恶的人身上浇。」

trans-unit.source: Shambling Suit
trans-unit.target: 跛行铠甲

trans-unit.source: Shambling Suit's power is equal to the number of artifacts and/or enchantments you control.
trans-unit.target: 跛行铠甲的力量等同于由你操控之神器和／或结界的总数量。

trans-unit.source: "The young squire gripped her sword as the clanking stranger emerged. It was no knight that had come to challenge her."\n—*Beyond the Great Henge*
trans-unit.target: 「咔嚓作响的陌生人忽然出现，年轻的扈从握紧利剑。前来挑战她的根本就不是骑士。」 ～*《圆石阵奇谭》*

trans-unit.source: Signpost Scarecrow

trans-unit.target: {2}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。

trans-unit.source: "Accursed scarecrow! Sending folk in every direction is the same as sending them nowhere at all."\n—Corliss the Wanderer
trans-unit.target: 「该死的稻草人！给人乱指路就和没指路一样。」 ～云游者柯力斯

trans-unit.source: Sorcerer's Broom
trans-unit.target: 术士扫帚

trans-unit.source: "Reynald wished for an army to sweep away his enemies. The fae king smiled."\n—*Beyond the Great Henge*
